description:
This is a market on whether a team from a “minor” region will get out of the play-in stage and reach the group stage of the League of Legends 2021 World Championship. The play-in stage runs from October 5, 2021, to October 9, 2021, and you can find more information on its process at this address: https://liquipedia.net/leagueoflegends/World_Championship/2021/Play-In
For the purpose of this bet, a “minor” region is one of the following six : the LJL (Japan) ; the TCL (Turkey) ; the LLA (Latin America) ; the LCO (Australia) ; the CBLOL (Brazil) and the LCL (Russia).
If at least one team from these regions qualifies for the group stage, the market will resolve “Yes”. Otherwise, the market will resolve “No”. If the play-in stage is postponed to a date on or before October 30, 2021, the same market conditions will apply. If the play-in stage is postponed to a date after October 30, 2021, or cancelled altogether, the market will resolve 50-50.

markets.question: Will a team from a minor region reach the 2021 LoL Worlds group stage?

title: Will a team from a minor region reach the 2021 LoL Worlds group stage?
